missions.title: Actor
missions.desc: Good morning Sir, I need an actor for my next anime project. The action takes place in a girl highschool near tokyo. what do you have for me?

missions.title: Builder
missions.desc: Hey, I lost two of my employees while building the Fookeeya-City's great wall. Could you lend me some of yours ?

missions.title: Sewer cleaning
missions.desc: Fookeeya-City's sewer are overflowing! Please send us some of your cheap workforce to help the cleaning.

missions.title: Wrestling animation
missions.desc: Hey, our kids are totaly crazy about that kids show, pukemon. Could you send us two of your guys for a cool surprise ? They'll love it!

missions.title: Bodyguard
missions.desc: Dude, I need some protection for like, 3 days, what do you have for me?

missions.title: VIP Air transportation at Fookeya
missions.desc: Hello, I'm in charge of the transportation at Fookeeya. We're currently working on a VIP Air-taxi service but our vehicules provider are late. Do you have some flying slaves I could use ?

missions.title: Laboratories test subject
missions.desc: Don't tell anything about the following request. I'm working on some new 'growing' pills and need some test subject. I heard monsters are close enough to human and can be used for therapeuthic tests. Could you send me some ?

missions.title: Get some contract

missions.title: Prospection frenxy

missions.title: Upgrade : Better price
missions.desc: "Kindly" ask your minions to to train to negociate, allowing your to buy slaves at a lower price.

missions.title: Upgrade : Better selling skills
missions.desc: "Kindly" ask your minions to to train to negociate, allowing your to sell slaves at a better price.

missions.title: Upgrade : Moar missions
missions.desc: Upgrade your desk drawers so your cab stock more missions!

missions.title: Upgrade : Moar monsters
missions.desc: Upgrade your cages' size so you can stock more minions!

missions.title: Upgrade : Moar rewards
missions.desc: Upgrade your minions efficiency, getting you more results from contracts!
